channel.title: dance on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in dance on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: The Relevance of Culture
item.description: A conversation with an old friend of mine revealed to me that the word culture is too often associated only with religion and ritualism and dismissed as irrelevant.

item.title: LfE 8: Gifford Lectures and Indian Festivities
item.description: 23/10/2009 Greetings! I recover from a cough as I write this. The reason for the long silence is the fever I had last weekend. I know you kind-hearted people are starting to worry already!
